sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Ski center will be closed 2/8 and 2/9.   Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.

Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for skate and classic skiing today, February 8, 2025 . There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: – Due to limited snowfall trails are unable to be groomed at this time.  When skiing the golf course trails please ski on designated marked trails only.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: This morning’s  snow  was the icing on the cake over a well layered and constructed base . Beautiful groom - well done Nubs crew ! LF 7

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Bucks has been good but likely groomed close to ski hours without time to set up,  so it’s turned to deep sugar after ski traffic. On the bright side, it is more work (challenging) and a good change from the rocket fast and effortless ball bearings as is typical. Wax is still insignificant…everything is fast. Still great to be skiing close to home and there seems to be a lot of daily XC traffic at HM.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 7 lifts, Space Worm and the Rope Tow
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open and will be power-tilled and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: Three inches of fresh snow landed on the slopes last night and this morning. The new snow is mostly groomed into the base and will further improve the already great skiing. NASTAR Racing is today from 12:30 to 2:30 PM on Birch Run, sign up to race at the front desk. Pintail Peak lodge is open with a deli and espresso bar. The slopes, parks and trails are in premium condition. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
